A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They really cared to make a movie that was true to the original trilogy. Jedis aren't some godly creatures like the shitty prequel jedis\, they are emotional knights with constant inner conflict trying to balance the light and dark. And in the end this movie is\, like the original trilogy\, an space adventure movie\, not much more. I'm glad they ignored the shitty and bloated expanded universe and just made an entertaining well crafted film. Well done Rian Johnson!
